title: Futbol Americas: Tecatito's injury derails El Tri's chances at Qatar?
description:
On Thursday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Mauricio Pedroza react to Tecatito Corona's injury that will force him to miss the World Cup for El Tri. Who should replace Corona in the Mexican National Team? Then we have an exclusive one-on-one interview with new LA Galaxy signing Riqui Puig. The La Masia product details his decision to move to MLS and his time at FC Barcelona. Then Leeds' Tyler Adams and Jesse Marsch have a sitdown where they discuss their time in RB Leipzig and Premier League move. Next, we recap the Women's International Champions Cup semifinals.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Herculez Gomez and Mauricio Pedroza react to Tecatito Corona missing the World Cup with a fractured fibula
